mean_cn: n. 进入者，新成员，参加竞赛者
mean_en: a person who enters something (such as a competition)
word_etyma: entr=enter进入 + ant表示人 → n. 进入者；新会员；参加竞赛者；新工作者
short_phrase: an entrant in the bikini contest
sentence: It's so funny - my teacher was another entrant in the 'sexiest bikini' contest!
sentence_trans: 太搞笑了！我的老师竟然是“最性感比基尼”比赛的另外一位参赛者。
